Comments_List: I gained an in-depth understanding of the culture and history of South Africa and a very solid foundation of the Zulu language.
I learned the basics and core of the Zulu language, as well as the history of the language and the people that spoke it. I also learned a lot about the country of South Africa.
This class helps you really learn a lot about the culture surrounded by Isizulu.

The teacher, or as we call her, "Thisha," is amazing at teaching Zulu. When I talk about the class, I usually refer to it as a history class where we learn the language as well because she does such a great job making the course comprehensive and engaging.
I would absolutely recommend this class to another student. It's an amazing way to learn about a completely different culture, and I couldn't recommend Thisha more highly as a professor.
This class provides an opportunity to learn about a wonderful language and culture. The professor is fantastic and will make you love the class. I definitely recommend this class.
